response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This exceptional item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its quality, craftsmanship, and historical significance. I am confident it could also bring immense value to your collection or business. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1200000}
